Introduction

        These tables contain all of the new mob drops added through the use of custom loot tables, as well as the steps to craft them on your own. It should be noted that custom passive effects from certain items (such as the cursed diamond) can only be obtained through the use of loot tables or commands.

I will not grant requests for access to edit the doc. If you would like to make a suggestion, message me on youtube/PMC/MCF/Curseforge.

Legend:

 = Rename with an anvil. (Names are case-insensitive.)

 = Enchantment
